domestically produced forestry credits to offset the tax. Colombia also is in the process of developing

stronger additionality for programs that encouraged set

level REDD+ payments to Guyana encouraged reduced
deforestation and increased carbon storage. Although more impact evaluation (IE) analysis needs to be

. However, a review of the National
